items.name: A Cozy Decomposer
items.desc:
A Cozy Decomposure
Range: Augment
Style: DDH India Pale Ale
ABV: 6.6%
Azacca is a big favourite here at Polly’s HQ and for good reason. Named for the Haitian god of agriculture, and bred specifically to accentuate the intense sweet, tropical notes it imparts, we find this varietal grossly underused and underrated in a sea of more popular hype hops. Letting it do its thing in a single hop showcase seemed the most fitting tribute for this awesome hop, and in a “well, why not” move we decided to up the dry-hop bill to DIPA levels, with an insane 40kg added during fermentation.
Wrapped up in a hearty lashing of LA3 for maximum suspension, the result is a thick, juicy IPA, bursting with tonnes of mango, stone fruit, and pineapple notes, before levelling off with a healthy tickling of bitterness on the end for ultimate balance.

items.name: DDH Pines
items.desc:
DDH Pines
Range: Augment
Style: Triple India Pale Ale
ABV: 10.0%
Once you’ve completed the original Augment trio, where do you go next? To the brewer’s favourite of course! A beer that was birthed from a collaborative effort with our pals at North Brewing Co last year, and an in house favourite amongst the brewers and office alike, we’ve amplified this beer to the nines for our final TIPA of the year. Going with a 10min whirlpool addition of Mosaic at 80 degrees, we opted for slightly more bitterness in this beer to counteract the sweetness from the residual sugar on the mash. Backed up with our biggest employment of our “pyramid” technique yet, with 25kg of Mosaic, followed up with smaller 15kg and 10kg additions of Galaxy and Simcoe respectively, the motto here at Polly’s is to never stop improving, and with DDH Pines, we’ve jumped a level once again.

items.name: Deluxe Edition
items.desc:
Deluxe Edition
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 7.0%
El Dorado is one of our favourite hops at Polly’s HQ and for good reason. Back once again for its third iteration and in our opinion getting better each time, Deluxe Edition is our celebration of all things El Dorado; a varietal with a backstory as mysterious as the mythical city it’s named after. With an aroma of ripe mango, papaya and, in our brewers opinion, Jelly Tots (yes, really), it tricks a drinker into believing they’re in for a hype juice explosion. By the time it hits the palate, all of those amazing citrus notes we love so much come to the fore and an all out attack of pithy bitter notes rock up to the party.
A single hop, maxed out hop bill in tribute to one of our favourite varietals; El Dorado, we salute you.

items.name: Every Piece Matters
items.desc:
Every Piece Matters
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 6.7%
A big part of our ethos here at Polly’s is getting the absolute max out of every ingredient we use to brew with. This is all on show with Every Piece Matters – two of our favourite hops in Citra and Mosaic receive the Augment treatment, as bright citrus notes meld with tropical fruit punch flavours to produce an IPA which is all about super low bitterness and high juiciness. After such incredible feedback on the three previous iterations of this beer, we were itching to brew it again; this time with every one of the techniques we’ve learned in 2020. An amplified version of our phenomenally popular Citra Mosaic IPA from our dearly departed Originals range; bringing all those incredible hop characteristics to the fore.

items.name: Little Rosa
items.desc:
Little Rosa
Range: Augment
Style: Pale Ale
ABV: 5.0%
Much like our efforts with TIPA versions of our original trio of Augment beers, it was only a matter of time until we completed our trilogy of condensed versions – finished here with Little Rosa. By far our most well-regarded and well known beer, we’ve challenged ourselves to bring all the incredible flavour notes, mouthfeel, and aroma down to a palatable and sessionable 5%. Never ones to turn down a challenge, the brew team have knocked it out of the park with this baby version of our headline beer. Featuring a fully reeled back 20kg hop bill of Mosaic, Enigma and Citra, and wrapped up in a big warm hug of our bespoke LA3 yeast strain, this beer, much like its bigger sibling blooms with a bouquet of all things dank and juicy but at a sensible and sessionable ABV.

items.name: Little Spur
items.desc:
Little Spur
Range: Augment
Style: Pale Ale
ABV: 5.0%
In the same way that we love to scale up our beers, we likewise love to take on the challenge to see if we can fulfil the flavour intensity and body of one of our IPAs, but reeled back to a sessionable strength. Spur is the undoubted in-house favourite of the original Augment trio, and we wanted to show just how much we love this incredible beer by bringing the ABV right down to a palatable 5%, whilst maintaining everything that made it our favourite in the first place. Our classic mash of extra pale, oats and wheat provides a solid base before the unparalleled three-way dry hop bill of Citra, Simcoe and Azacca unleash a full on juice explosion with a metric tonne of mango, passionfruit and papaya notes, before being reeled back in with our whirlpool addition of Simcoe providing an earthy bitterness to finish.

items.name: Surface Edition
items.desc:
Surface Edition
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 7.0%
We’ve always had a thing here at the brewery for those big, brash IPAs north of 7% brewed by those old school brewers that we grew up drinking. Those base flavours from the malts, accentuated by the flavour profiles brought to the table by the hops, they all come together as the strength heads into the upper echelons of IPA territory. As a brewery that firmly embraces the past in our brewing style, we’ve employed our pyramid dry-hopping technique here with a heavy dose of the present in Azacca, before a nod to the past with a smaller but still healthy addition of Chinook, finishing with an eye on the future with a further small addition of Sabro. Expect tropical juice to meld with pina colada sweetness before finishing out with piney bitterness in this all out smasher of an IPA.

items.name: The Altar Supreme
items.desc:
The Altar Supreme
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 5.9%
We’ve said it once and we’ll say it again, we love paying homage to the OGs of brewing – the brewers who produced the beers without which we wouldn’t be here today. This rings true for wanting to pay homage to the classic IPAs – slightly weaker in strength than our usual 6%+ fare, but retaining all that incredible flavour profile, body, and mouthfeel of what we do best. The Altar Supreme is our take on those classic IPAs – coming in at a more reasonable 5.9% but supercharged with 30kg of El Dorado and Vic Secret for all those new school notes. A beer that brings all those juicy, candied orange, stone fruit, and mango notes we’re so famous for to the party initially, but backed up with a delicious resinous bitterness for complete balance.
